concept.title: Additional Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can add custom configuration properties to the MapR Multitopic Streams Consumer. You can use any MapR or Kafka property supported by MapR Streams. For more information, see the MapR Streams documentation.

conbody.p: additional propertiesMapR Multitopic Streams ConsumerMapR Multitopic Streams Consumer originadditional propertiesWhen you add a configuration property, enter the exact property name and the value. The MapR Multitopic Streams Consumer does not validate the property names or values.

p.note:
The MapR Multitopic Streams Consumer origin uses the following MapR Streams configuration properties. The origin ignores user-defined values for these properties:
auto.commit.interval.ms
enable.auto.commit
group.id
